Level 12 or 17Equal to 2d8 + this armor's enhancement bonus.
Level 22 or 27Equal to 3d8 + this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Sylvan Armor
item.fluff: This brown and gray armor is favored by those who want to move like a leaf carried along on a forest breeze

item.title: Tactician's Armor
item.fluff: In battle, strength of mind is as important as strength of body, and this armor ensures that you have both
item.headline: History checks

block.name: Property
block.line: When a power or class feature uses your Intelligence modifier to determine a value other than your attack bonus or damage, treat your Intelligence modifier as 1 higher. This does not change your Intelligence modifier for any other purposes.

item.title: Thought-Eater Armor
item.fluff: The gaze of your enemies seems to slide off this nondescript armor, almost as if you weren't there

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, you have concealment against enemies that are more than 2 squares away from you.
1Total concealment instead of concealment.

2Total concealment instead of concealment, and if you used this augment outside of combat, the power lasts for 1 hour and you can use this concealment to hide. If combat starts, the concealment ends at the start of your first turn.
Special (Level 18, 23 or 28)As part of a short rest, you can expend a healing surge to recharge this power.

item.title: Time Link Armor
item.fluff: Woven from shimmering crystal, this light chain suit improves your reaction time
item.headline: Item BonusInitiative checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll initiative and dislike the result
EffectYou reroll the triggering initiative check, but must use the second result.
If the second result is worse than the triggering result, you regain the use of this power after your next short rest.

item.title: Uniform of the Hidden Temple
item.fluff: This muted gray uniform protects you from watchful eyes and lets you skillfully slip past your foes in combat
item.headline: Stealth checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou shift
EffectYou increase the maximum distance of the shift by a number squares equal to one-half this armor's enhancement bonus, rounded up.

item.title: Versatile Armor
item.fluff: The wearer of this armor moves with more alacrity than one might expect, and can employ that speed to his or her advantage against unprepared enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou take a -1 penalty to AC, but ignore any penalties to speed and checks caused by this armor. This persists until you use a minor action to end this effect, or until the end of your next rest, whichever comes first.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend an action point, you gain a +1 item bonus to all attack rolls and defenses until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have an action point available
EffectYou spend an action point to regain one encounter power of your choice.

item.title: Vitality Armor
item.fluff: When you take a serious wound while wearing this armor, it feeds you back a bit of your lost vigor

block.name: Property
block.line: When an enemy scores a critical hit against you, you gain temporary hit points at the start of your next turn. The temporary hit points equal 5 + twice this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Wall Armor
item.fluff: This armor seems far heavier than its constituent material, and it can become as unforgiving as a brick wall at a moment's notice

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with a bull rush or charge
EffectYou can choose to negate any forced movement from the triggering attack.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, the triggering enemy takes 1d6 damage per plus. If any forced movement was negated, the triggering enemy is also knocked prone.

item.title: Warding Spirit Armor
item.fluff: The primal power infused within this leather armor draws power from your spirit companion to shield you from attack when your guard is down

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC against reactive strikes while your spirit companion is present in the encounter.
The bonus increases to +4 if your spirit companion is within 2 squares of you.

item.title: Warmage's Uniform
item.fluff: These decorated greatcoats come in a variety of styles, but all lend military might to their wearers

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an arcane attack power

EffectChoose one ally within 5 squares of the triggering enemy. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen ally gains a power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy. The power bonus equals this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Whiteflame armor
item.fluff: This armor absorbs light and can be converted to protect against other effects

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 radiant.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou change the resist you gain from this armor to one of resist fire, resist lightning, or resist thunder. This lasts until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Wintersnap Armor
item.fluff: This strange white armor absorbs cold winds before they find your flesh, storing the bite of the frigid air so you can bring it forth when the time is right

block.name: Properties
block.line: This armor has the following properties:
You gain resist cold equal to 3 + twice this armor's enhancement bonus.
You gain an item bonus to Stealth checks in snowy or icy environments equal to twice this armor's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou activate an Aura 1 (Cold) until the end of the encounter.
Level 24 or 29Aura 2.
Squares in the aura are difficult terrain for creatures other than you.
